query: I am hiring for Java developers who can also collaborate effectively with my business teams. Looking for an assessment(s) that can be completed in 40 minutes.
Looking to hire mid-level professionals who are proficient in Python, SQL and Java Script. Need an assessment package that can test all skills with max duration of 60 minutes.
I am hiring for an analyst and want to screen applications using Cognitive and personality tests, what options are available within 45 mins?
Need a leadership assessment for senior executives that can be administered remotely
Looking for adaptive assessments to test verbal and numerical reasoning skills
Need short cognitive tests under 30 minutes for entry-level positions
Software engineer assessment for C# developers with problem-solving focus
Customer service representative assessment that evaluates both technical skills and personality traits
Assessments for data scientists that test R and Python skills along with analytical thinking
Quick personality assessment for team fit that can be completed in under 20 minutes
